issue.title: [Dev] Process the saved nightly build data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13060](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13060). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
One ARROW-13059 is done and we have historical data for each build saved somewhere reliable + accessible, we can analyze it. (We can even use arrow to do that!)

At a minimum we should do the following:
- days since last passing
- last commit that passed
- % of failures in the past week, month, year
  
  Some of this info has also been requested to be added to the emails as well, though that is a separate ticket at ARROW-12821. This ticket should be only for that information on the static site. We might use the same machinery/code for both, but they should be implemented separately so that they don't distract or block each other.
